    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • lookupAID

        public AID lookupAID(byte[] buffer,
            short offset,
            byte length,
            boolean appletInstancesOnly)
        Lookup applet AID instance by AID value contained in byte array.
        Parameters:
        buffer - buffer containing AID
        offset - offset in buffer where AID starts
        length - length of AID in buffer
        appletInstancesOnly - search within applet instances only
        Returns:
        applet context AID instance

      • getSharedObject

        public Shareable getSharedObject(AID serverAID,
                        byte parameter)
        Called by a client applet to get a server applet's shareable interface object.

        This method returns null if:

        • the Applet.register() has not yet been invoked
        • the server does not exist
        • the server returns null
        Parameters:
        serverAID - the AID of the server applet
        parameter - optional parameter data
        Returns:
        the shareable interface object or null
        See Also:
        Applet.getShareableInterfaceObject(AID, byte)

      • saveState

        public void saveState(PersistentMemory pm)
        Save runtime state to persistent memory.

      • loadState

        public void loadState(PersistentMemory pm)
        Load runtime state from persistent memory.
